name: The Sautekh Dynasty
startIntroPart1: Imotekh, my Phaeron, we have arried at this floating rock. As ruler of a dynsasty that has etched themselves into the Easten Fringe, it is your right to reclaim the galaxy for yourself. All your empire from a civil upon your now throne world Mandragora.
startIntroPart2: Great Stormlord, master stratagiest of warfare, how do you seek to reclaim your galaxy?. How will you reforge this world?
declaringWar: Order. Unity. Obedience. We taught the galaxy these things long ago, and we will do so again.
defeated: Our people are awakening, and soon all of the galaxy shall be ours once more.
afterPeace: Next time, do not have such faith in your negotiation skills.
